name: slack-reacjilator
description: A translation bot for Slack that translates a message when a user reacted with an emoji

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy ivp-translator --env-vars-file .env.yaml --entry-point events --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --region asia-northeast1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-test: gcloud functions deploy ivp-playground --env-vars-file .env.dev.yaml --entry-point events --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --region asia-northeast1 --allow-unauthenticated

author: Tomomi Imura
